Lyric:
[00:42.420]I am loving living every single day but sometimes I feel so.
[00:53.700]I hope to find a little peace of mind and I just want to know.
[01:03.580]And who can heal those tiny broken hearts, and what are we to be.
[01:14.380]Where is home on the Milky way of stars, I dry my eyes again.
[01:24.550]In my dreams I am not so far away from home.
[01:29.500]What am I in a world so far away from home.
[01:35.250]All my life all the time so far away from home.
[01:40.500]Without you I will be so far away from home.
[01:46.310]If we could make it through the darkest night we have a brighter day.
[01:56.720]The world I see beyond your pretty eyes,
[02:02.240]makes me want to stay.
[02:07.720]And who can heal those tiny broken hearts,
[02:12.780]and what are we to be.
[02:18.500]Where is home on the Milky way of stars,
[02:23.590]I dry my eyes again.
[02:28.710]In my dreams I am not so far away from home.
[02:33.460]What am I in a world so far away from home.
[02:38.640]All my life all the time so far away from home.
[02:44.000]Without you I will be so far away from home.
[02:49.870]I count on you, no matter what they say,
[02:54.860]cause love can find it time.
[03:00.600]I hope to be a part of you again,
[03:05.650]baby let us shine.
[03:10.670]And who can heal those tiny broken hearts,
[03:15.970]and what are we to be.
[03:21.490]Where is home on the Milky way of stars,
[03:26.590]I dry my eyes again.
[03:31.310]In my dreams I am not so far away from home.
[03:36.570]What am I in a world so far away from home.
[03:41.840]All my life all the time so far away from home.
[03:47.500]Without you I will be so far away from home.
[03:53.200]In my dreams I am not so far away from home.
[03:58.900]What am I in a world so far away from home.
[04:03.280]All my life all the time so far away from home.
[04:08.590]Without you I will be so far away from home.
